# DocScale: Digital Marketing & Website Development for Doctors

> DocScale is India's premier digital growth partner for healthcare professionals. We specialize in building high-converting medical websites, implementing patient-centric SEO, and managing online reputation for doctors, clinics, and hospitals.

## Core Services & Capabilities

### 1. Medical Website Design & Development
- **Keywords**: Medical website design India, Clinic website developers, Doctor portfolio website, Hospital web design, Mobile-friendly clinic site.
- **Description**: Custom, fast-loading, and mobile-responsive websites designed specifically for healthcare providers. Features include online appointment booking, patient education portals, and WhatsApp integration.

### 2. Healthcare SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
- **Keywords**: SEO for doctors, Medical SEO services, Rank high on Google Maps, Patient acquisition SEO, Local SEO for clinics.
- **Description**: Data-driven SEO strategies to rank your practice at the top of Google for specialty-specific keywords (e.g., "Best Cardiologist in Mumbai", "Dental Clinic near me").

### 3. Google Ads & Patient Lead Generation
- **Keywords**: Google Ads for doctors, PPC for clinics, Medical lead generation, Patient inquiry generation.
- **Description**: High-ROI paid advertising campaigns targeting patients actively searching for your services.

### 4. Online Reputation Management (ORM)
- **Keywords**: Doctor review management, Practo review improvement, Google My Business optimization for doctors.
- **Description**: Strategies to generate more 5-star reviews and manage your digital reputation across platforms like Google, Practo, and Lybrate.

## Target Audience
- Doctors (General Practitioners, Specialists, Surgeons)
- Dental Clinics
- Multi-specialty Hospitals
- Diagnostic Centers
